price: ហើយផែនដី និងភ្នំត្រូវបានគេលើកចេញ(ពីទីកន្លែងរបស់ វា) រួចវាទាំងពីរក៏បែកខេ្ទចខ្ទីតែម្ដង។
arabic: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: waḥumilati al-arḍu wal-jibālu fadukkatā dakkatan wāḥidatan
